theNeed.title: The Need
theNeed.paragraph: Depression affects millions worldwide, yet many struggle to access proper care due to systemic barriers.

points.title: High Costs
points.desc: Traditional therapy can be prohibitively expensive, with sessions often costing $100-$200 each.

points.desc: Many areas face therapist shortages, with waitlists stretching months for new patients.
